Tucson nodds.

" Well, you heard it straight from Lord Elder, Straight Shot=
.  But that doesn't mean we can't form a formidable force against Hydras."
=

Straight Shot nodds with understanding.

"It was worth a shot. Oh well, yo=
u're right.  We got enough power here to take down Hydras if we put our spa=
rks to it."

Rat Trap grins.

" Oooooh A big brain storm is hitting my tiny=
 processor... When in doubt, send the little guys in ta do the dirty work. =
 I could go with Cheetor, and like I did before, sneak into the small space=
s and have myself a little fun... Ya know, cross a few wires....  Technical=
 difficulties..."

Night Shift steps forward.

"Or try ta connect with thei=
r central computer system from here'n ya know, infiltrate without physciall=
y infiltrating...."

Rat Trap bounces with excitement.

"Ooooh, I like that=
.  No one gets hurt, and we might just possibly lower the enemy's resistanc=
e..."

Tucson narrows a brow.

"That might just work..  After all, sometime=
s we have to think off the pavement don't we?"
